title: Training-Free Color-Aware Adversarial Diffusion Sanitization for Diffusion Stegomalware Defense at Security Gateways
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: The rapid expansion of generative AI has normalized large-scale synthetic media creation, enabling new forms of covert communication.
